attributes.action: Pass a law forcing all travellers and gypsies to have trackers fitted to there caravans, then register all occupants over 18 to that tracker. That way the government agencies can keep a track on the whereabouts of all occupants to deal with any problems that arise. It cannot be said that this discriminates against these people as the people who live in britain in houses are registered on the electoral role.
